text:
NCR | Atlanta, Ga | Fulltime | Onsite | stackoverflow.com/jobs/companies/ncr-corporation

NCR is hiring for a large number of full time development positions, including: - DevOps - Software Engineer (iOS, C#, Java, Javascript, and .NET) - QA We're in construction building a new headquarters in Midtown Atlanta right by Georgia Tech's Campus but until then we are working out of The Biltmore, Alpharetta, and Duluth.

If you have any questions, please send me an email at bz185013 at ncr.com
